faqs.heading: What is Royalty-Free Content?
faqs.description: Royalty-free content allows users to use it without paying ongoing fees after purchase.

faqs.heading: How Do I Purchase a License?
faqs.description: To purchase a license, select your desired content, add it to your cart, and complete the checkout process.

faqs.heading: Can I Use Images for Commercial Projects?
faqs.description: Yes, most royalty-free images can be used for commercial purposes, but check the license details for any restrictions.

faqs.heading: Do Licenses Expire?
faqs.description: No, once you purchase a royalty-free license, you can use the content indefinitely without renewal fees.

faqs.heading: What File Formats Are Available?
faqs.description: Files are typically available in JPG, PNG, and sometimes SVG or PSD formats, depending on the content.

faqs.heading: Can I Resell Purchased Content?
faqs.description: No, you cannot resell, redistribute, or claim ownership of royalty-free content.

faqs.heading: Is Attribution Required?
faqs.description: Most royalty-free licenses do not require attribution, but always check the specific license terms.

faqs.heading: What Happens If I Use Content Without a License?
faqs.description: Using content without a valid license may result in legal action or copyright claims against you.
